titleStmt.title: The Christian sword and buckler, or, A letter by D. Sprint to a man seuen yeares grieuously afflicted in conscience and fearefully possessed by the Diuel very comfortable and commodious to withstand the assaults of Sathan.
titleStmt.author: Sprint, John, d. 1623.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B. Alsop for Samuel Rand and are to be sold at his shop at Holborne Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
